benchmark_details.name: ResearcherBench
benchmark_details.overview: ResearcherBench is the first benchmark focused on evaluating the capabilities of Deep AI Research Systems (DARS) on frontier AI scientific questions, with a dataset of 65 expertly selected research questions spanning 35 different AI subjects categorized into technical details, literature review, and open consulting.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities of Deep AI Research Systems (DARS) in assisting researchers with pioneering scientific inquiries.

data.source: Curated from authentic frontier scenarios including laboratory discussions, interviews with AI researchers, and discussions in scientific forums.
data.annotation: Expert-reviewed and validated by experienced AI researchers.

methodology.calculation: Coverage score based on expert-designed rubric criteria and factual accuracy metrics.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better insight quality and factual accuracy.
methodology.validation: Multi-faceted validation involving expert reviews and automated assessments.
